Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Usun (Qhureyshi korosuuy, yahuud kee nasaarâ koros kinnuk) Qhuraan kura kurah hee mara kinnon, tu kaak nummaysaanaah tu kaak dirabboysaanamal
Tokkel Nabii Mucammadow ku Rabbi isil xiibitak nanu diggah Qhiyaamah ayró gino inkih esserenno iyye
Usun addunyal numtinwwellitte qibaadaa kee wohuk kalah abak suggu iyyeenimil inkih
Toysa Nabii Mucammadow cakki seecoy ku Rabbi koo kah amrise fayyah, fayya hayisaay, korosut derre cabaay, ken umaanet tu mawin
Diggah Nabiyow nanu Qhureyshi korosih abbobtiy kol anqassah umaanek koo xiqneh ken bayisneemil
Yallâ luk aka Yalla haa mari, sinni uma taamah ellecabo sarrah Aaxigelon, Addunyaa kee akeeral
Nummah Nabiyow diggah atu usun kok iyyaanamat kaalil ceytam nanu naaxigeh
Toysa Nabii Mucammadow atu isi Rabbi saytunnoysak faylisaay, Yallah salat abaah kaa yaqbude marih num tik, koo biyaktaamak usuk koo xiqelek
Nabii Mucammadow isi Rabbi umman uqbud Rabi koh amma iyyam fanah kaak iyye Yalli
A-korosey Yallih Amri (Qhiyaamah Ayro kinnuk) yemeeteeh, xayyooweh, tokkel Nabii sin kah xagnise digaalat maasassakina, agleh kaat hayya haanamak Yalli saytunnooweeh fayya iyyek

Yalli malayka wacyi luk isi fayxiiy, isi amrih oobisa, isi naqoosak (ambiyaa kee farmoytit kinnuk) isih faxa maral, sinam Yallat agleyta haytaamak meesiisa iyyaanamah, diggah yok sa qibaada cakkisita Yalli mayanak yok meesita qibaada yoh caglisak iyye Yalli
Qaranwaa kee baaxo cakkil gine Rabbi agleh kaat hayya haanamak saytunnooweeh, fayya iyyeeh nabah
Yalli seehadaytu tiffoytak {daacoyta kinnuk} gine, tokkel usuk Yalli rabeh yan mara mugsa iyyaamal baxxaqqa iyya kaxxa giddi-li kinni
Yalli lac siinih gineeh, xabcak edde gamittan saray kay xagooruk (dagooruk) bicissaana edde litoonuuh, gersi tuxxiq kee cado kaak takmeenim edde liton
isin ama lacat carra kaa orbissan waqdii kee Saaku kaa dacrissan waqdi walle siinit culussa qaxmaqaane kaat liton
